article_title: Germany Urges Iran to Be More Active in Bringing Peace to Syria
article_text:
TEHRAN—On his first visit to Iran, German Foreign Minister Frank-Walter Steinmeier has urged the country to assume an active role in the pacification of the conflict in Syria.

“It is of course my wish that Iran uses its influence in the region and…on (Syrian President Bashar) Assad to ensure that we take the first steps toward a de-escalation in Syria,” Mr. Steinmeier said on Saturday in Tehran, after a meeting with his Iranian...

twitter.description: German Foreign Minister Frank-Walter Steinmeier has urged Iran to uses its influence in the region and on Syrian President Bashar Assad to bring about a de-escalation of hostilities.
